stories.text:
Been on a Warp Records binge for years, and trying to find "new" music. "New" as in new exposure, not so much "new" as in "recent", but it could be.

Figured people here would have an interesting range. Maybe you're listening to something similar to Warp's stuff, or maybe it's on the complete opposite end of the spectrum. Whatever it is, give it a go and share it here. Would love to know
stories.title: Ask HN: What're You Listening To?

The same concept, when applied to VR headsets, would help to prevent Facebook or other companies from taking a proprietary hold over VR tech
